m_szDocTitle: Hyundai Delivers First Fuel Cell Vehicle in Ontario :: NGT News
m_szDocSumamry: Hyundai Delivers First Fuel Cell Vehicle in Ontario Categories : New & Noteworthy Hyundai handed over the keys to the first Tucson Fuel Cell Vehicle (FCEV) to a customer in Ontario. Joseph Cargnelli, chief technology officer and co-founder of Mississauga-based Hydrogenics Corp., took delivery of his 2015 Tucson Fuel Cell vehicle. “I am extremely proud to be Hyundai’s first customer in Ontario to take delivery of a fuel cell vehicle,” says Cargnelli. “Hydrogen-powered fuel cell technology has the incredible potential to revolutionize our world by delivering clean energy to meet our every need;
